name: Demonic Suitors
summary: You have just received an invitation to a prestigious school and are on your way when your chauffeur takes a sudden turn into a dark tunnel! You’re certain this must be a mistake but after the bumpy ride, you’re greeted by a devilishly handsome young man who calls you “princess.” Just one thing, though—he’s got horns on his head! If there’s one thing the school failed to inform you, it’s that the school is for demons.
